LanguageData.BiomesCaverns_AllowCoolingEnclosedEarthe: Cool enclosed areas in the Earthen Depths
By default, the game will cool enclosed areas under thick mountain roof. You can disable this setting to make the Earthen Depths ignore this feature, making the biome even more challenging.
LanguageData.BiomesCaverns_ResetSettingsHover: Reset all options of the mod to their default values.
